name: Kikunoi Honten
description: Three Michelin-star kaiseki restaurant offering exquisite seasonal Japanese cuisine in a traditional setting. Reservations required well in advance.

name: Selene
description: Upscale restaurant in Fira showcasing modern Greek cuisine with local ingredients and caldera views. Romantic atmosphere and excellent wine list.

name: Dill Restaurant
description: Michelin-starred New Nordic cuisine using Icelandic ingredients. Innovative tasting menus highlighting local flavors and traditions.

name: Nomad
description: Trendy restaurant in the medina serving modern Moroccan cuisine with international influences. Beautiful rooftop terrace and creative cocktails.

name: The Bison Restaurant
description: Mountain lodge dining featuring Canadian game meats, local ingredients, and craft beers. Cozy atmosphere with stone fireplace and rustic decor.

name: Nishiki Warai
description: Casual okonomiyaki restaurant near Nishiki Market. Watch chefs prepare savory pancakes on your table grill. Great value and fun experience.

name: Lucky's Souvlakis
description: Popular local spot for authentic Greek souvlaki, gyros, and mezze. Casual atmosphere with generous portions and friendly service.

name: Bæjarins Beztu Pylsur
description: Famous hot dog stand serving Icelandic hot dogs since 1937. A must-try local institution with unique toppings. Quick and cheap.

name: Café des Épices
description: Charming café in the spice market serving Moroccan and Mediterranean dishes. Rooftop seating with medina views and relaxed vibe.

name: Park Distillery
description: Craft distillery and restaurant on Banff Avenue. House-made spirits, creative cocktails, and elevated pub food in a lively atmosphere.
